channel.title: Save On The Persol PO2945V
channel.description: Persol was created in 1913 by Italian optician Giuseppe Ratti. Ratti’s intention was to create effective, safe glasses to protect the eyes of pilots and sports drivers, as well as providing maximum comfort. From this, the ‘Protectors’ were born. The Protectors were large glasses that sit snugly to the face to protect the eyes fully [...]

item.title: Save On The Persol PO2945V
item.description:
Persol was created in 1913 by Italian optician Giuseppe Ratti. Ratti’s intention was to create effective, safe glasses to protect the eyes of pilots and sports drivers, as well as providing maximum comfort. From this, the ‘Protectors’ were born. The Protectors were large glasses that sit snugly to the face to protect the eyes fully [...]
